TextByLang.en: Well hey there, you're a new face. What brings you to this old Corral?
What!? YOU'RE the old shepard's grand-kid? Well it's nice to meet'cha, I wasn't expecting you until tomorrow!

You'll have a lot to learn if you're gonna become a shepherd on par with your old grandma, she was a mighty fine lady. But here's the breakdown: You adopt 'em, you feed 'em, you train 'em, and then you battle 'em.
Eventually your little fiends, 'Cryptids' they're called, will tire out and you'll need to retire them. It's a sad day for everyone, but they can't stay with us forever...
Well that's about it! How bout I walk you on over to visit the Nursery and get you your first Cryptid?
Hi there, welcome to the Nursery! I'm not very good with faces...do I know you?
Oh! You're the old shepherd's grand-kid! Nice to meet you! Well here at the Nursery we do our best to match you up with a friendly new Cryptid based on a Runic Pattern of your choice.
There are only so many Runic Patterns out there, so once you've adopted the Cryptid from one, it'll become deactivated. So how about it, ready to get yourself a Cryptid?
Oooh! You've got yourself a new {cryptidSpecies}! What a sweetie! I'll send it back to the Corral for you. Make sure to take good care of it!
Take your pick from these Runic Patterns we have available and we'll get you a new Cryptid to take home with you today.
